response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you. We are excited to offer you this opportunity to own such a valuable asset.

To make this transaction possible, we propose a purchase price of $1,150,000. We believe this figure strikes a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and our desire to ensure a fair deal for both parties involved.

Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
